attributes.additional_details: The town of Hartlepool has a very high crime rate and the people of the town feel vulnerable knowing there is a lack of police on the streets to keep them safe.
attributes.background: We want the Government to raise funding for the police force, increase police wages, and increase their presence on the streets.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/624527
